step_feedback.feedback: You're doing a great job sitting or standing comfortably. Focus on gently squeezing your shoulder blades back and down.
Excellent! You're effectively squeezing your shoulder blades back and down in a circular motion. Keep up the good work.
You've completed the repetitions! Remember to inhale deeply as you pull your shoulders back to maximize the benefit.

exercise_summary: You've successfully completed your shoulder rolls! This exercise helps improve shoulder movement and supports lymphatic flow. Remember to breathe deeply as you roll your shoulders back to get the most benefit.
